title: Horrific footage shows teenager being severely beaten by young thugs on train as other passengers fail to intervene
text:

Shocking footage captures the moment a teenager was beaten relentlessly on a train while fellow passengers refused to help. 
The young male was attacked by a group of thugs who punched him in the head and kicked him as he was sitting behind a older man, and in front of a woman. 
The Queensland Rail train was travelling from Ipswich to Goodna, Australia, when the incident occurred. 
In the clip, the teenager is approached by two men who punch him repeatedly in the head and chest. The teenager cowers in his seat as he is attacked 
People in the background appear to encourage the attackers before one bystander eventually tells them to 'leave it'. 
No one steps in to stop the fight. 
The victim walks away from his attackers before the video ends. 
The video was posted on Facebook by a concerned mother who wanted to warn others about the violence. The teen was punched in the head and kicked repeatedly 
She said her children travel to school on the exact same train and were 'traumatised' after witnessing the fight. 
She wrote: "Please be careful when letting your children train it home as there is a group of young males who frequent the train stations from Ipswich to Goodna train lines." Read More Queensland Rail are said to be investigating the incident (Photo: Getty) 
The assault, which occurred yesterday was reported to police. 
Queensland Rail told 9news.com.au : "Our officers livestreamed CCTV at the two stations where the group exited the train to monitor the situation, while emergency services responded. 
Additional security resources have been deployed in the area. 
"Safety is Queensland Railâ€™s number one priority and we do not condone violent or disrespectful behaviour on our network." 
Queensland Police have yet to comment to Australian media. Like us on Facebook
